products.name: Platinum Bars
products.description: Ingots casted from the metal Platinum. With only 0.005 parts per million found in the Earth's crust, platinum is rare even by the strictest of standards.

products.name: Golden Nugget
products.description: A rare golden nugget. Better than the cereal.

products.name: Ikea Sofa
products.description: An aesthetic finnish made sofa from IKEA.

products.name: Metal Pipe
products.description: Metal pipes, these are stiff. Make sure they are used for construction and not fighting.

products.name: Solana
products.description: A cryptocurrency token known as Solana. Who knows what this could be worth in 2 years?

products.name: Melted Ice
products.description: Perfect to water down a glass of Brandy. Unfortunately it melted.

products.name: Empty Present
products.description: A surefire way to ruin a kids christmas! The grinch loves these!
